== Elements ==

You can use the `char` attribute on the following elements:

  * [ColElement <col>]
  * [ColgroupElement <colgroup>]
  * [TbodyElement <tbody>]
  * [TdElement <td>]
  * [ThElement <th>]
  * [TfootElement <tfoot>]
  * [TheadElement <thead>]
  * [TrElement <tr>]
